title: Episode 170 w/ Marlon Wayans
itunes:title: Episode 170 w/ Marlon Wayans
description:
N.O.R.E & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. On this episode we welcome back the incredibly hilarious Marlon Wayans! In our first episode we smoked out Marlon so much he let the world know! This time around he comes back prepared... if that's even possible. In this episode Marlon talks about his new movie SEXTUPLETS and his love for Comedy. We also discuss topics regarding Comedians making a comeback, Bill Cosby, R.Kelly and much more! We're also joined by our friend Jack Thriller!

This time around he comes back prepared... if that's even possible. In this episode Marlon talks about his new movie SEXTUPLETS and his love for Comedy.
